mapper.select: select m.template_name as manage_name,m.template_author as manange_author, d.template_name as diy_name,d.template_content as diy_content,d.extension_name as diy_extension,d.prefix_default as diy_prefix from template_manage as m , template_diy as d where m.template_id =#{id} and d.belong =#{id}
